documents.document: It's a snooze your alarm 6 times kind of morning 😴😴
Absolutely no time for mind games 🙅🏼💭
Came home to mum and dad tucking into a chippy. Just you enjoy that whilst I cook myself chicken and veg. Moral support and all that 🙃🖕🏼
Two workouts today and I'm having to drag myself up my stairs by the bannister 😰♿️
Crawling around the floor like a bear was not what I was expecting at today's gym class 🤦🏼‍♀️🤦🏼‍♀️
Can't wait for a spa day with my bestie this weekend @demmsssx 💆🏼👙🏊🏼‍♀️
Ladies Day Ticket purchased 🐎👗🍾🥂💕💅🏽💄👑
@meganshearer_ Can't wait to see you too my gal 💕💕
@BetaCuckLoser you are more than welcome 😂😂
What idiot decides to leave doing their tax return until the 30th of January when it's due on the 31st? Yep 💁🏼💁🏼
Gutting your room always seems like a fantastic idea until you're in the middle of a mountain of shoes and clothes 🙃🙃
Could do without feeling like absolute death 🤒🤒
Virgin Media wifi is about as useful as a chocolate teapot 😤😤
Deciding what to eat when you're hungover is one of the hardest things in life 🤦🏼‍♀️
@rikkiwilkesx You're basically my boyfriend anyway.. Nobody else brings me flowers and my fave chocolates 🤷🏼‍♀️
Need someone in my life who will bring me my fave food and juice when I'm in such a needy, fragile state ☹️☹️
@LauzBaker thanks my gal 😚
In need of the most cuddles and a triple portion of Nando's peri peri chips.
One word. Rough.
Stranded in Newcastle because we're both still drunk and can't drive 🙃🙃
They can imitate you but they can't duplicate you. Cause you got something special that makes me wanna taste you 💃🏼🎵
Wowza someone needs to ban me from my phone when I'm intoxicated 🤦🏼‍♀️❌
@hcwarex @MorganSeatonx Thanks prinnnny! 😏❤
Away for one night and we have two suitcases and four bags between two of us 🙃🙃
Leaving for Newcastle in an hour, not packed, no outfit, and currently getting make up done. Organised 🙃🙃
Can't deal with shite texters 🤦🏼‍♀️❌
That 9 hour sleep was well and truly needed. I feel like a new woman 💁🏼💁🏼
I have absolutely no time for this being unwell nonsense 🤒🤒🤒
@Ferguslockhart Fergy, it's horrendous 😭
I'll tell you one thing for free, I'm never driving down Riccarton Mains Road ever again. I was almost a goner 🤦🏼‍♀️🤦🏼‍♀️
@dionnemcleodxx Happy Birthday babes! Hope you've had a fab day! 💕
Always good waking up with the sorest throat and no voice 🙃🙃
@carsyy Ashley Top Snake Carr x x
@MorganSeatonx get me on that dfloor with a drink in hand asap 💃🏼💁🏼
Nail, eyelash and brow day. Happy Monday 👸🏼💅🏽
Absolute strugggggs this morning 🤦🏼‍♀️🆘
Sleeping alllll day on a Sunday seems like a good idea until you're still wide awake at this time 🙃🙃
Is it really a Sunday if you don't spend it overthinking absolutely everything in life?🤔
Slothiest Sunday ever 💆🏼💆🏼
@katrinascoular Happy Birthday Hun! Have the best day ❤
These migraines need to stop 🤒🤒
Getting woken up by drunken FaceTimes is what I love 🙂🙂
Most cravings for a pornstar martini 😻😻
@MorganSeatonx Happy for you my gal! Well done 😚❤
When you've hit that awful stage where you need your hair done, eyebrows done, and a hundred sunbeds. Not okay 🤦🏼‍♀️
Absolutely hit a brick wall today 😴😴
How amazing is she 😭❤ @MorganSeatonx https://t.co/r9aYlnbuOT
The one night I'm absolutely shattered and there's a fox screaming outside. Give. Me. Peace. 😭😭😭
@leahlawasx Happy Birthday babes! Hope you're having a fab day 😚💖
Every single day I say I'll get an early night and every single night I'm still awake at this time 😭😭
2 gym sessions today and a hamstring injury. My poor wee legs 😰♿️
Not a wink of sleep in sight.
Can't stand bad texters 💁🏼❌
My heads actually up my arse today 😭🆘
Back to boxing tonight 😊💪🏼
Mmmm how beautiful is Tom Hardy 😻😻😻
How boring are all these football tweets on a Sunday 😴😴
I have absolutely zero patience with technology 😤😤
Waking up at this time on a Sunday is ideal 🙂🙃
When we did not know the answers, and I miss the way you make me feel, it’s real 🎵

This staying in on a Saturday night malarkey is no fun 😒❌
Amazes me how selfish people can be 😴

When you're enjoying a nice long lie until your neighbour starts drilling. I will kill 🙃🔪

@MorganSeatonx of course you are 💃🏼💃🏼

How good does it feel being back into a healthy eating and gym routine 😊💪🏼
When everyone's complaining about having work in the morning and you work from home and chose your own hours 😊😊😊
So overwhelmed by the amount of nice messages I've had from people over the last few days 😢❤
